channel.title: Maria Nieves on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Maria Nieves on Simba Tango

item.title: Our Last Tango -- Copes y Nieves
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Now this looks like something to look forward to: In „Our Last Tango“ Juan and María tell their story to a group of young tango dancers and choreographers from Buenos Aires, who transform the most beautiful, moving and dramatic moments of Juan and Maria’s lives into incredible tango-choreographies. These beautifully-shot choreographies compliment the soul-searching interviews and documentary moments of the film to make this an unforgettable journey into the heart of the tango.
